33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"By the One in Whose Hand is my soul! Ibn Mariam shall soon descend among you, judging justly. He shall break the cross, kill the pig, remove the Jizyah, and wealth will be so bountiful that there will be none to accept it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي نُزُولِ عِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Descent of 'Eisa Bin Mariam(Peace Be Upon Him)
